home.subtitle: A place of worship, community, and spiritual growth

worship.description: Experience meaningful worship through music, prayer, and the Word of God

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Connect with others and grow together in faith and fellowship

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Sharing God's love and making disciples in our community and beyond

schedule-desc.description: Discover a space for faith, fellowship, and spiritual growth throughout the week. From moments of worship and biblical teaching to prayer meetings and youth gatherings, each gathering is designed to strengthen your relationship with God and the community. We invite you to join us and share in God's presence!

ourLocationVideo.title: See how to get to the church

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To share the love of Christ, make disciples, and serve our community through worship, fellowship, and outreach.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a vibrant, Christ-centered community that transforms lives and impacts our city with the Gospel.

faith.title: Biblical Faith
faith.description: Grounded in Scripture and committed to sound doctrine

community.title: Authentic Community
community.description: Building meaningful relationships and supporting one another

service.title: Servant Leadership
service.description: Following Christ's example in serving others with humility

pastors.quote: Héctor and Maribel Sánchez lead with compassion and purpose, inspiring others to grow in faith and live with hope through their example.
pastors.name: Héctor and Maribel Sánchez

worshipTeam.quote: The Worship Ministry passionately guides the congregation in genuine worship, creating an environment where the presence of God transforms lives.
worshipTeam.name: Worship

womenMinistry.quote: The Women's Ministry strengthens each woman in her identity in Christ, providing support, prayer, and spiritual growth in unity.
womenMinistry.name: Women

menMinistry.quote: The Men's Ministry raises up men of integrity, firm in faith and committed to their families, church, and purpose in God.
menMinistry.name: Men

danceMinistry.quote: Through art and body expression, the Dance Ministry celebrates freedom in Christ, bringing a message of joy and spiritual surrender.
danceMinistry.name: Dance

youthMinistry.quote: The Youth Ministry encourages the new generations to live an authentic faith, developing leaders passionate for God and His Word.
youthMinistry.name: Youth

chaplainsMinistry.quote: The Chaplaincy Ministry provides spiritual support in times of need, offering comfort, hope, and love to every touched life.
chaplainsMinistry.name: Chaplains
